website_summaries.verdict: This 2-pound bag holds approximately 100 treats ranging from 1-to-4 inches in length to keep your small-breed dog chewing happily for months.
pros: Suitable for toy breeds and puppies, these bully sticks come from free-range, grass-fed Brazilian bulls
The treats are nearly pure protein, with no additives, preservatives, or added color
Fido will be occupied and entertained for hours
cons: All bully sticks are very high in protein, which can upset some dogs' stomachs
This can result in diarrhea or gas

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: These seemed like a great deal, so I ordered them to keep for later use. When I finally opened the bag I was disappointed. Most pieces were ok, but many were small rings or pieces that the dog could choke on. Those got tossed. Then, I took a closer look I saw many had strings attached or small metal rings! (See photo). So I just threw the rest away. I LOVE my dogs and I'm sure if you're reading this you feel the same way about your dogs...so I recommend NOT buying this brand. Amazon has better bully stick brands available.
customer_reviews.author: Lamb

customer_reviews.title: My dog enjoys the bully bites but be careful I ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoys the bully bites but be careful I found a metal piece in one of them. See photo
customer_reviews.author: LUCINA

customer_reviews.title: This was the 2nd bag of Bully Sticks I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the 2nd bag of Bully Sticks I have bought. The handy dandy, "Buy Again" button was convenient. The first time I bought a bag it was made in the U.S. These were not, they were made in.Brazil. The product itself was inferior to the first bag. Strong smelling, a lot of little chunks, that are more prone to choking, than chewing. Very disappointing. A company that may put your pet in danger, should not be in business.
customer_reviews.author: cherye

customer_reviews.title: Too nasty for me
customer_reviews.text: These are the most disgusting, smelly things I've ever let into my house, so, of course the dogs loved them. I just found out they aren't real bully sticks, which I don't mind the smell of. These are deceptively called Jr bully sticks, but they're really bladder pieces. All in all, I'm NOT happy with this purchase, but I got them on a lightning deal, so I'm not going to complain too much. The dogs did love them, and if we had outdoor dogs we'd keep them. I'm just going to find someone else to give them to.
customer_reviews.author: E W Puddle

customer_reviews.title: Pieces too small
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, both of my dogs (medium and large dog) got sick after eating these. The back of the bag says they are healthy chews but the pieces are too small for the dog to actually chew them! A majority of the bag consists of chews 4 inches or smaller! I gave them two small pieces which I think is the problem. The dogs didn't chew them much and the pieces just sat in their stomachs until they both regurgitated them. Waste of money for a medium or large dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... in shape and size but this last one is disgusting..
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item several times and they are usually decent in shape and size but this last one is disgusting... I don’t want to even give them to my dogs. They look like balls of dry blood. I would return it and ask for a refund but I s already put them in another container, as I usually do, and put the bag on the trash.. never will buy again. They should be more careful on how to balance the pieces and don’t send all the bad ones in one bag. I’ll upload a pic...
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality treats for a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more pleased with this product. Same great quality product that they sell in larger portioned piece sizes but much cheaper when purchased in this mixed sized bag. I have two 45 lb dogs and I am pleasantly surprised that they don't have any problem eating these smaller sized pieces. I was worried about a choking hazard but it doesn't seem to be an issue. They seem to be so interested in them that they chew them up as much as they possibly can before eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Duke

customer_reviews.title: Used to be the Best treat I've ever found
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love these. I buy two bags a week due to them being spoiled to these. BUT THESE LAST FEW BUYS MY DOGS WERE NOT HAPPY WITH THE BAGS. THEY NORMALLY WERE BITES THAT THEY HAD TO CHEW, SINCE THEY ARE SUPPOSED TO BE BULLY BITES. But these last few bags have been disappointing. They have been just a thin layer of whatever. But there was nothing to chew on cuz it was mostly a hollow piece of skin. The little dogs cud eat these as fast as big dogs. It just defeats the purpose of buying Bully Bites that are supposed to be tough for tough dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bones
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased bully sticks from this company and they were great. but when I purchased these they weren't what the picture shows. it shows little sticks! when I opened the bag the odor was overwhelming! then the bites were like bent knuckles and very dry. the sticks I bought before, my dogs would work on for days, as they are 5 and 11lbs, but big chewers. after I gave them 1 they would not chew on it a second time as these bones were extremely dry! the shapes were flat and wide and bent to a point on the other end. alot of sharp edges. very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: patti vandepol

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these!! This is our 2nd bag. I have a small 6lb and 25lb dog. Both would love to eat these all day. I like the product is US made. I watched the youtube videos and purchased with skepticism since i was worried about quality. No problems. They are stinky but that is the nature of this natural product. This is great entertainment as well as teeth cleaning for the pups. I habe even shared thia brand with other dog owners. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Quincey Y.

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to find a decent amount of bully sticks for an appropriate price. However, these are just too small, even for my small dogs. There are a few big pieces in the bags which are wonderful, but the majority of the bag are tiny pieces which caused a gastrointestinal blockage in one of my dogs. Luckily, she survived, thanks to our vet. My other two dogs were throwing up the small pieces. For the safety of my dogs, I cannot recommend this to anyone. Best Bully Sticks other products are good, but this should be taken off of shelves or should not have the super small pieces anymore. It’s just not safe.
customer_reviews.author: K & K

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & my dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: Bullysticks are great. My boys absolutely love them. I have a Frenchie and a Bischon mix and the bag is perfect. The different sizes within the bag makes it nice to pick and choose what to give them. My Bichon mix has a sour / sensative stomach with food. He is completely fine with these bullysticks. He has been eating them several weeks and has not gotten sick. I do warn you, they do smell. But all bullysticks smell. Will definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Surfriderca

customer_reviews.title: DEMAND TO KNOW WHY QUALITY HIT ROCK BOTTOM!!!
customer_reviews.text: Would leave negative stars if an option. Not sure what happened. Back when we first started ordering all types of “Best” (??????) Bully Sticks.... they were consistent and adored by both our fur-kids. THEN, BOTH of them began to turn up their noses at the regular/thin sizes (unheard of since their puppyhood). THEN they decided they prefered the Bully Bites...THEN, the inconsistencies of the Bully Bites (NOT BITES-more like hollow tubes and/or stringy bits of CHOKING DANGER!!) began to arrive. Not sure what is going on but I would much rather make my own healthy treats for my babies rather than risk ordering any more of these sub-par death traps!
customer_reviews.author: ShoeCrazed

customer_reviews.title: Gross, not worth it, sourced from Brazil.
customer_reviews.text: The "best bullysticks" bag I received smells worse than other bully sticks. The pieces aren't regular sticks, they're just a bunch of disgusting looking hollow scraps and I also found a piece of plastic in the bag, so check carefully! My dogs loved them but I'm not taking any chances so I threw them out. The pieces crunch into shards as soon as they bite them and they're gone in minutes. Plus, this company gets their product from Brazil, where livestock standards and conditions are way worse than in America.
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: Not for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this huge sack of these treats. These are a different brand than I usually purchase. My dog REFUSES to even take it from my hand. She sniffed and walked away. I fell for the "Amazon Best Buy." Cheaper is not better. I trashed the entire bag when my neighbor's dog also refused to eat one. Went back to my regular brand.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nan Jones

customer_reviews.title: STINK STINK STINK!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for the past year and my dogs love them. However, the most recent bag I ordered had this god awful stink that overwhelmed me as soon as I opened the bag, so much so that I actually held my breath when reaching in to get one for my dogs. And once my dogs started chewing on these the smell was absolutely nauseating. I don't know if this most recent batch was sourced from somewhere different...and that's what is causing it but I don't think I'll be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: CaliDiva

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bag and I used to absolutely love them for my dogs. Today I received a bag and noticed pretty much ALL of them were "hollow." Not really any "solid" pieces but empty shell looking ones. I really liked them for my dogs because it would take about 5-10 minutes depending on the size and shape for them to get through it. Now that they are like tubes of paper, they go through them in about a minute. I'm disappointed in the quality and will probably start looking at other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kanna

customer_reviews.title: My Pom loves these and great price for 2 pounds!
customer_reviews.text: They stink, but I only notice it when I open the bag, not when he is chewing. He is a 13 pound dog and these bites are mostly just right for him -- some have been pretty big braided bits, but he somehow separates the pieces and I put the extra back in the bag for next time. He loves them and they are good for his teeth - we brush them a once or twice a week and he gets one of these each evening; our vet is really impressed with his tooth health! It's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: It caused my dog colitis
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs and both ate of those bully sticks - not every day, though. I can tell that both don't digest them well based on the slimy stool consistency every time after they eat them - I won't go into details for the sake of everyone's feelings, but what is severe is that one of them actually got colitis (inflammation of the intestine) and it got bloody. Literally. A vet visit and over $550 less I would not recommend this product at all!
customer_reviews.author: Liliane

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I really like these "snack" size pieces of bully sticks. The bully stick product is expensive when you buy finished sticks, braids, etc. The bag of "pieces" looks essentially like scraps from the process of making finished items. Still pretty expensive as dog treats go, but it's a win/win. The dogs don't mind getting a scrap piece for a treat; they're cheaper than the regular products; they're smaller than a full item so you have more flexibility about the snack size you want to give at any particular time. I'll be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: EBK

customer_reviews.title: They are little hollow pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bully stix at the recommendation of a friend. The first bag came and their were a few true "bully stix" in there, but most were hollow pieces. Since I have a puppy I thought they would be ok. I ordered another bag . This bag is worse than the first one! Even my puppy can chew them in about 5 minutes! Will never order again and definitely will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cmccracken69

customer_reviews.title: These bully sticks are perfect for our Yorkies
customer_reviews.text: These bully sticks do not contain rawhide. My yorkies love them. The sticks are small enough that they work on them easily and when they get the bully sticks down to about 1 1/2 inches long, I toss them so the dogs don't get choked on the small pieces. These work great for their chewing instinct. It helps keep the tarter off their teeth. Great value, too. Lots of bully sticks in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs just luv them
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these 4 times, You never know if you are gett6sicks or pieces. I pay top much for pieces. Let me know when you get back to sticks. Cannot feed these pieces be6my Rottweilers swallow them. I NEED STICKS!!!! The reviews r wrong. My 2 dogs have eaten them for yrs. Whatever they swallow the digestive system takes care of it plastic. IT'S ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Means

customer_reviews.title: Great for a variety of dogs
customer_reviews.text: I run a non-profit dog rescue, so I may have anything from a young pup to a dog 3 to 5 years old. I end up buying a variety of treats and chewies. Of course, I would not give these to the youngest of pups. But from six months and up, these are great! Everyone loves these. It keeps them busy for a few minutes, so I can get a few things done. I call that a win-win. I have ordered these twice and will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Corgi power chewer loves them
customer_reviews.text: My corgi loves these. They're just long enough to keep him chewing for a while, but not too long to where the smell lingers. They smell, but while the dog is chewing it, there isn't a crazy smell like with some of them. No upset stomach, no runny poo, these are his favorite. He's a power chewer and knocks them out in 30 min. Regular chews he can tear through in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette G

customer_reviews.title: unbleached bully stick chew
customer_reviews.text: Good product used as treat for my pup. The only minor complaint I have is that the individual stick size varies from bag to bag. Sometimes an entire bag is made up of long twisted full length sticks, other times the sticks are cut up into smaller bite size segments. Regardless of the size, my dog loves the treat and I will keep on buying more bully sticks!
customer_reviews.author: Shop Smart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect treats
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite bully sticks for my two girls. They are both under 30lbs and these are the perfect treats to satisfy them. I give them each one in the morning and the bag is lasting quite a while. Prior to finding this bag I was going through another brand every two weeks, spending $20 on one bag of 25 or so slightly larger sticks. I will continue to purchase these!
customer_reviews.author: MamaOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them, all that matters.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these puppy snacks because I have a daily visitor, my neighbor's dog. I wanted to get him something special that might take longer to eat then the chicken jerky, but also not anything that could hurt his belly. These snacks advertised they are completely digestible should he swallow a piece, so seemed like a good choice. Package looks great. All great pieces. They do have a little bit of a smell, but my four legged neighbor seems to really like them. No preservatives, no fillers, just pizzles. Honestly, I did not know that meant bull penis at first. But if they make my furry friend happy, that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Gogh

customer_reviews.title: Best way to keep your dogs relaxing for a while!
customer_reviews.text: I have ten dogs so my house can get a bit rowdy at times. I wanted a treat all could eat, was not rawhide, provided nutrition as well as cleaning teeth and provided entertainment, I can say I got it all with these bully sticks! It would be wonderful if the subscription price was a bit lower so I could buy more bags but once a month will have to suffice. With ten dogs I go through a bag in a week. Definitely worth it though if you only have one, bag would probably last a month.
customer_reviews.author: S. Leyva

customer_reviews.title: Better than store bought
customer_reviews.text: I usually shop @ Marshalls for good deals, but during these challenging times, I had to find an alternative for my loves. The dogs - a Golden & a Lab - are huge fans. I write this review on their behalf & wouldn’t rate if it wasn’t true. I even subscribed this item to ensure they’ll get to enjoy them until the pandemic blows over. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Smell like death; dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: Big bag (best value for the price; trust me, I searched!) & the dogs love them, which gives me a break from their attention, so I love that. But the smell, uggggh so gross. They smell horrible and then the blankets that they eat them on also stink. I thought maybe it was just me because I'm pregnant but then my husband said "what smells like death?". LOL! You definitely want to wash your hands after giving the dog a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My small elderly picky dog showed mild interest but he likes an easier chew.
customer_reviews.text: My little pompillion dog is extremely picky about treats. He is almost 10 yrs old and loves to chew in moderation. These bully sticks looked perfect for him. The only problem was they are short but the circumference is the same as regular bully sticks. He was excited at first but soon lost interest because they were bigger than his small mouth wanted to chew on. I gave them to my neighbor who has a young goldendooddle. He LOVED them. She said they are his favorite treat and are big enough to keep him occupied for awhile but not too big to be burried for later. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Gail M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Only bully sticks my dog will eat!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 50 pound German Shepherd puppy who absolutely LOVES these! The only bully sticks he actually EATS; he just throws the others around like toys. Even though these are small, it takes several minutes for my dog to work thru them. And he is an aggressive chewer! I just give him a couple small ones, instead of one large. I keep them in a cookie jar for easy treating, and they do not smell up the house.
customer_reviews.author: sew girl

customer_reviews.title: DOGS LOVE THESE THE VERY BEST..!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love these Buddy sticks.. Whenever they go potty, I bring them in, and they go straight to the cupboard, because they know that is where they are kept.. Have 2. Macie is a Pit Bull/Black Lab mix.. She is 4 years old and is so sweet. The other, Gypsy, is about 3 maybe. Not sure, she was a rescue..Anyway, she is Pit Bull/Boxer mix.. She too, is the most well-minded and sweet dog.. I love them both so much. They deserve the best, and I feel that your BestBullySticks are just what they need as a treat. Thank you so very much..
customer_reviews.author: JO S.

customer_reviews.title: To many knots and odd pieces.
customer_reviews.text: These have some really small pieces in them. My Larger dog has been not chewing them enough, and ends up coughing or choking them up. My little guy, likes the longer thin ones out of the package and seems to do okay with them. But I will stick to the longer ones, and just cut off what I need for each dog. They do carry a strong unpleasant order.
customer_reviews.author: VS Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller dogs or quick treats
customer_reviews.text: My West Highland Terrier/Shih-Tzu mix (~14 lbs) can't chew like my Australian Shephard mix or my American Bully, both 60+ lbs. I wanted to get her a chewy treat she could actually finish, and these are perfect! Not all of the pieces have filling like the regular bully sticks, but my dog doesn't care. I've been buying products from this company for over a year now, and the quality is pretty consistent. My dogs never have tummy problems and the prices are good. If only they made cat chews, too....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hollow bites offering no chewing time!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these bully bites for my two small dogs for months because they love them! My latest purchase arrived a few days ago. Unfortunately, this is the 2nd time I received a batch that consisted of mostly hollow "bites". This defeats the purpose of them giving them their nightly 'goodie' that offers a decent chew-ability time. They gobble these up in a matter of minutes. I hope this is just a glitch, and not a new standard for Best Bully Bites. I'll be returning these in the hopes of getting the quality product I'm used to. I will update when that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Z

customer_reviews.title: Quality has changed.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to rate this because in the past these were great but something has changed. I have a subscription to have a bag shipped every month and for a long time they were great but the last few bags haven't been the quality we are used to. They have become much smaller sometimes almost bite size that may two small dogs make disappear in no time, we were used to a longer lasting treat. The bag I received for my January shipment contains small, hallow pieces. I'm very disappointed, these are hardly a treat for my dogs anymore. I'm considering cancelling my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting chew my dog loves, good value, but smell bad
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and they take her longer to chew than anything else we've tried (besides rawhide which she barely will give any attention to so that doesn't really count). I can't give it 5 stars because they smell SO BAD. If you are within 6 feet of your dog while they're chewing them you'll be smelling it and not want anything to do with them. If you're not worried about the smell...do yourself a favor and don't look up what a bully stick is made from.
customer_reviews.author: Heather2005

customer_reviews.title: Product changed
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have always liked these but the last bag were smaller pieces that were so hard the company had taken a saw to them to cut them up. My dogs do not like these rock hard pieces so I am stuck with the bag. I don't know if this was a one time thing but am unwilling to buy another bag and chance being straight them too.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Better for BIG Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My Bernese Mountain Dog can chew through these but smaller dogs may have trouble. They are really hard! I do detect a smell when they are eating one but it's not overpowering and it does not seem to linger. With the bigger chunks, she takes a while, keeping her busy and she seems to really like them. Reason for the 4-stars and not 5? Price. This is a good price for this product but compared to other treats these are really expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Burstiner

customer_reviews.title: Smells smells smells.
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased when I ordered them. With the great price. However when I opened them the smell is over powering. Nothing but the smell of rotting. I have bought many bully sticks but these smelled like well rotted meat. Was not going to have my dog eat these and tossed them out.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Booth

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This brand is amazing, I have 3 mid sized dogs and the actual size of the bully sticks are all perfect for them. I had purchased other brands before and they were tiny and my dogs would finish them in one second if not just swallow them, these last long and my dogs love it.... it does smell bad but totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jo W.

customer_reviews.title: Much waste included in these packages.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these three times. The second time I actually got sticks so tried again. Two of the times I have had so much waste that I cannot afford to buy them again. 1/4 of this last bag are so small I would not even take a chance on choking. It is sad because the second bag was perfect and I need to order more bully sticks. I have to pass these up as I get too angry seeing the waste they include.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Werner-hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great value and my dogs LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: I had to laugh when they wanted a review on flavor. My dogs would give them a 5 star review. I can’t provide an opinion on this matter. The scent isn’t strong, as I’ve experienced with other bullies in the market. And let’s face it, you simply can’t beat this price!
customer_reviews.author: Mjm579

customer_reviews.title: wow these smell horrible
customer_reviews.text: If you ever wanted to know what a dead rotting fish smells like this is it. I can barely open the bag each time without gagging. I typically buy the order-less version which my mistake this is not. Not sure I want to feed these to my pup omg. My other concern is that the pieces can be very small for choking hazards
customer_reviews.author: pike513

customer_reviews.title: Expect tiny pieces being the most
customer_reviews.text: The first bag I received was great. The sizes varied, and there were many more medium size bones. The last two bags were full of tiny fragments and pieces that dogs chew so quickly. I’m writing this because my friend who also ordered these said the exact same thing happened to her. These do not smell badly and the value of the first bag was great.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger McCann

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved them! I couldn't believe I could the amount I did for that price either. It's so much easier then buying from a store and paying WAY more money. I'm always skeptical on the quality and nutrition when it comes to things like this but I was very satisfied. I will be ordering from them on a regular basis from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jjani634

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them and they clean her teeth
customer_reviews.text: We've been giving our dog one or two of these every day for the last several months. She loves them, and just got a very positive report on her teeth at her annual exam. The vet assumed that we brush her teeth, but we don't. The bites are great because of the smaller size, we don't feel that they make up too much of her diet.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C

customer_reviews.title: Best Bully Sticks are the Best Value, too!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd order of these Bully Sticks. My 10lb Morkie loves them. I like the variety of sizes and types of sticks. And they don't disrupt her stomach as some chews do. They are a great value, too! Update: My dog loves them so much I signed up for auto delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Renee M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this product for my 15 lbs dogs. They are smaller size and if the finish the whole piece it would not be too filling. However, in the past the pieces were 2.5-3 inches long. In this package, they are around 1 inch long. I could not give it to my small dogs as they just swallow the whole piece. I had to throw it away. It was very disappointing. Not sure I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie W.

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like these. It's the first time I've gotten bully sticks for them. In regards to the ratings for Scent and Flavor, I don't know whether they have a positive or negative scent and I certainly didn't taste them. I assume they taste ok since the dogs eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Preuit

customer_reviews.title: Dogs' favorite
customer_reviews.text: All of my dogs love these bully sticks. I have small and medium dogs and the sticks are not uniform size, so I can pick out small ones for the small dogs and bigger ones for the medium dogs. They last a long time and keep the dogs occupied. They do have an odor, but the dogs love it, I only smell it when I'm taking them out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Doggo will do any trick for these and train new ones with ease.
customer_reviews.text: I feel this product is the best value on the web. I prefer (so does my pup) larger pieces. The previous bag had giant chunks of pizzle, but the last one, not so much. However, the product quality is the same and the beast would kill for these. No more pig ears for us.
customer_reviews.author: baddad

customer_reviews.title: More like scraps rather than bite sized pieces of bully sticks
customer_reviews.text: This bag comes with some bite sized pieces of actual bully sticks, but a lot of it is tiny misshapen or hollow pieces. It's definitely a way for the company to sell the stuff they would have otherwise thrown in the garbage. I use them as a supplement to the 6 inch bully sticks for my dog who has a full blown bully stick addiction and harasses me all day for them.
customer_reviews.author: AlyssaMarieBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Dogs enjoy this wholesome treat
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price for a dog treat that lasts for more than a few seconds. The boys seem to enjoy their chew for quite a few minutes before the treat disappears. These sticks are about 1/2 the length of standard bully sticks, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Chihuahuas ranging in size from 4 to 8lbs. These are a perfect size for all of them and provide a distraction for several hours for me! There are a surprising amount of large pieces and this bag lasts us almost 2 months. My babies LOVE them!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana S.

customer_reviews.title: Declining quality, really small pieces in the bag
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product has really declined lately. My last bag was full of pieces that were less than 2 inches long and mostly hollow. It’s kind of annoying because my dogs chomp these up in less than a minute. They used to be better with longer and thicker sticks.
customer_reviews.author: A Harrill

customer_reviews.title: Tiny pieces
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying these for quite some time. The dogs love them, but this last bag is noting but tiny pieces. The largest piece in there is maybe 2 inches long. This creates a choking hazard. We won’t buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: william whitaker

customer_reviews.title: quality not up to par on 2nd bag
customer_reviews.text: First bag we purchase our GSD loved them. This bag she will just sniff and walk away. They are very tiny too. Last bag were at least one inch each. Very disappointed because with the last bag she would get sooo excited to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Vanderso4

customer_reviews.title: Yummy treats for my pups
customer_reviews.text: My pups (I have two) really love these bully sticks! Just the right size, smell and flavor. When I give them one, they love to chew on it for hours! Seems to really help with their teething stages right now. Thanks for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 3 dogs (7 LB & 2 18 LBs) absolutely love these. Perfect size, 2-4" long. Most dogs prefer the stinky, tasty ones & these fit the bill! Once they start chewing, I don't notice the odor anymore anyway. Have previously purchased many bully stick bags =, both the regular & junior size from Best Bully Sticks. Will likely stick to these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Because they’re not actually bully sticks some of them are just really thin pieces of crap
customer_reviews.text: I’d say these are junkie pieces they aren’t true bully sticks which was what was advertised. One of my dogs can eat them and one can’t Because they’re not actually bully sticks some of them are just really thin pieces of crap
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Super Deal on these Awesome Bully Sticks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these once before off Ebay... Imagine my SURPRISE when they came in an Amazon box with a receipt inside for LESS than I paid the jerk on Ebay who is profiting like $1.80 every time they sell this item. Fool me once... So here I am, happily buying directly from Amazon. LOVE these BTW. The bites are mostly nice long pieces 4" or so and then plenty of 1"-2" pieces. The dog I give them to doesn't swallow things whole so they work great for her. Be careful, total choking hazard for certain dogs. Know your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan W.

customer_reviews.title: Odor most foul!
customer_reviews.text: Will not purchase again. The dogs love them, but they smell so foul that I nearly throw up every time I open the bag. I may end up tossing or donating the bag before it’s done. I’ve bought many bully sticks over the years and never experienced any this bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jan McAfee

customer_reviews.title: Best value!
customer_reviews.text: I've been shopping around for bully sticks. These are by far the best value. These aren't the 12 inch sticks, they're about half the size. Which is perfect as I don't need to cut them for our smaller dogs. I plan to order a few more bags as our dogs love these treats!
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Made my dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: Got these a few days ago for my male since he absolutely loves bully sticks and i was excited for him to try these. Unfortunately these made both my dogs very sick and caused them to vomit multiple times and made them seem lethargic and after they ate about 2 or 3 pieces each. My dogs dont have a sensitive stomach and never have but for some reason these made them act out of character. Since i took them away and threw the bag away they returned to normal. Wont be buying these again.. Watch ur dogs if u purchase these some are very small and could cause choking.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie barnes

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to first say that our dog really likes these stinky things, it's hit or miss with the size you will get. We've purchased probably half a dozen bags , the sizes are always different. Our last bag was filled with nothing but 1" to 2" pieces, the bag before were all about 3" to 4", a surprise in every bag. I will probably continue to buy these as I said before our dog likes them, just wanted to rant about the size of pieces. They do stink after they've slobbered on them for a few minutes, you'll need to wash the beard often.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the hopes that it would be enough to satiwteo dogs. It certainly does and the pieces are assorted so I can monitor who has what size piece. There's a ton of treats in this bag, I'll definitely be getting these again.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t answer the flavor, not interested in trying it lol - but the dogs go crazy for them! Great value. All sizes are mixed up ... some are quite a good size, others not! I don’t notice a strong odor. I give them to my German Shepherds under supervision. They can last up to 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schutte

customer_reviews.title: Great value, the pups LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: Our pups LOVE these! They are a great value and we have been a loyal customer for years. Somehow the dogs know when we're out of bully sticks and won't leave us alone until we replenish our stock. Oh and they're a great distractor as well. Keeps them busy for at least a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Dog gone good
customer_reviews.text: I have a small breed dog and he loved these from day one. They are quality and animal perfect. Nom nom nom says Wrigley every time he gets one. They lasted a long time too. I bought them a while ago and he took a long time to get through. Will buy more. This is my go to snack for my little one.
customer_reviews.author: ShaveIce

customer_reviews.title: The Little Hooligans love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 energetic small dogs, about 30 pounds each. These bully bites are nice relatively inexpensive, as bully sticks go, and the little ones love these. I have these on autoship so they're on my doorstep without my having to remember to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: critterma

customer_reviews.title: Addition to my message
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to add the first 3 bags I got were great. My dog, puppy and grand puppies loved them. I don’t know what happened to this bag but you can see in the picture they are small paper thin and sharp. It really upset me when I opened the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Portella

customer_reviews.title: Be aware that these are bite size
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered Bully Sticks from this brand before and my dogs loved them. I purchased these not realizing they were "bites". Choosing the largest ones from the bag, I tried them with my dogs. They loved the flavor, but didn't fully chew them up so these bites have made them throw up. Be sure it's bites you want if you order this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Dogs LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these, and I like the cheaper price than many bully sticks created overseas. We have both big and small dogs, so the variation in sizes is great. It’s important to never giver your dogs rawhide or pig ears, and these are the best alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Best Pizzle
customer_reviews.text: Best pizzle I have found. Perfect for my poms in size, and they LOVE them. They take HOURS to "finish" one. They are less stinky than other brands , and seem less processed. You know right away you are giving bull dicks to your dog. Dried pizzle. Look it up, Pizzle. There is no doubt what they are chewing on. Get past it. These are an awesome, quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Onimous

customer_reviews.title: The pups love them.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of the pack for the price. I don’t need perfect shaped bully sticks for the dogs to chew on so these work just fine compared to others we have bought in the past. Our dogs love them so I assume the flavor is great! LOL.
customer_reviews.author: 1Swan

customer_reviews.title: Not USA Made
customer_reviews.text: Did not notice that they were not USA made therefore they were not of any value since I do not feed any of my 11 dogs any non-USA products. Some people do not have a problem but I think this should be made very evident in the product description that this is a non-USA product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Dog will ONLY chew on these!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old female American Pitbull Terrier, a sometimes veracious chewer, when she is in the mood for a chew toy or treat. These Best Bully sticks in the smaller bit size version are the ONLY ones she will eat. If we buy the sticks, we have to cut them into pieces with a band saw. This brand is odorless, and high quality and she chews two to three pieces per day. They last a few weeks. I highly recommend them especially for Bully breeds and chewers.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Reeve

customer_reviews.title: All 4 of my dogs give 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: All 4 of my dogs loved them! Usually we have one or two that do not like something but this makes them all happy. Also, gives them something to chew on and keep them out of other things they are not supposed to chew on for a while
customer_reviews.author: Carol F.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs' favorite treats! I get three bags with my monthly subscription
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! My three dogs will trample each other to try and get there first when they hear me open the bag. I've been getting these, along with many other Best Bully Sticks products, for over 2 years now and will continue to as long as they keep making them! Customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Murphy

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: update: the seller was great and we received new bully sticks, and they are great. I have been really happy with previous purchases, but this bag is different. 75% of the pieces are completely hollow, so my dogs don’t get any chew time! Hopefully quality control will get a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for bully sticks
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with these Bully Sticks and so are my 2 dogs. They are a great value. I don’t buy the large sticks because they are expensive and my dogs try to eat the large ones in one sitting. These are different size pieces which are perfect and so is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carolene R Mays

customer_reviews.title: You do not get what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: In reality these look nothing like the photo...they are all different sizes, colors, shapes and content. They are not cleaned up and smooth like the photo shows....they have tendon, skin, and I can only imagine what other pieces still on the stick. One of my dogs threw up after the first treat. I will never buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: craftyfox

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the smell at all but it does not matter because my 4 dogs love them!! I have one golden Retriever, 2 cocker Spaniels and 1 Belgian Malinois and they all love them!!
customer_reviews.author: babyta

customer_reviews.title: Great treats and good value!
customer_reviews.text: My small dog likes these hollow, crunchy treats a lot better than the harder, solid type. Our picky large grand dog loves them, too! A nice large bag full. A little stinky, but that's what dogs like.
customer_reviews.author: Vanborshe

customer_reviews.title: TOO many tiny pieces
customer_reviews.text: TOO many tiny pieces, Im afraid my dog will swallow them whole. PLUS these really stink, but my dog loves things that stink so that can be a plus. I don/t think I would buy again due to the many tiny pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mik E Mouse

customer_reviews.title: This was a re-order - 'nuf said!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves the large Bully Sticks and the small ones are the perfect size for a quick little treat/keep her busy goodie. She gets very excited when I go into the pantry and is so happy with it even though she gets one almost every day!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Merritt

customer_reviews.title: The pups love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: I try to snag these Bully Sticks when they're on Amazon's Lightning Deals. My dogs love them! I have a 150 lb English Mastiff and an 8 lb Chihuahua. The variety pack of "pieces" has an assortment of sizes for both of them! These are great to take on roadtrips and keeps the dogs occupied in the car :)
customer_reviews.author: SadieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a good size bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are not tiny pieces. There are some good size pieces and well worth the the cost. Super great price as these things are not cheap. My dogs love them! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Antoninette Amador

customer_reviews.title: These parts don't seem as digestible as the regular bully ...
customer_reviews.text: These parts don't seem as digestible as the regular bully sticks and also tend to break more resulting in undigested parts being vomited up. Never have this problem with the 6" or 12" bully sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For smaller "chunk"-style bully sticks, these are still fairly substantial and allow my heavy chewers a few minutes chomping before they're gone. Don't smell too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what happened but I've been purchasing Best Bully Sticks for over 10 years
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened but I've been purchasing Best Bully Sticks for over 10 years,. I started ordering them via Amazon Prime because they arrive quickly and I get good rates on shipping. This order I received is what you would expect from a 3rd rate bully stick company. They are sticky and greasy and have a strange coating of a grain like substance. I'd like to throw these away and get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: julie reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great bully product for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value for my small (10-15lb) dogs. They are perfect for getting out some frustration/energy and good for aiding in keeping their teeth clean. Most pieces received have been 1.5” - 3” in size.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not the normal size bites like these  usually are
customer_reviews.text: I love the bully stick bites because they are perfect for my 2 small dogs but this last batch I received was not the typical bully bites that I usually get. Typically they are 2-3 inches long and thick but this last batch is a bunch of 4-5 long bully stick but they are mostly hollow and not the thick bites like usual. Don't know what changed or if I was just sent the wrong order but I am not hesitant to continue to buy this brand if they aren't going to be the normal bully stick bites that I have been buying for years from Best Bully Stick bites.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Minnick

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: These Bully Bites are wonderful. I used to give my three dogs rawhides until I read how dangerous (and unhealthy) they are. I was buying the full size Bully Bites from my local pet stores however they are pretty pricey. The nice part about these "Bites" are they are smaller so they're more practical than the large ones. The dogs love them!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki O

customer_reviews.title: They've changed😕
customer_reviews.text: My dogs use to love these. We've been buying them once a month for atleast the past year mabye more. The past two times, mabye 3 that we've gotten them though they have been small and thick pieces not the longer twiggy ones we had been use to and my dogs can't chew them because there is not enough of then to be able to grip with their paws to hold while chewing. It's very disappointing and my dogs keep looking for the good ones!
customer_reviews.author: dianna squillace-Manno

customer_reviews.title: Assorted pieces, still a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great price for bully sticks, it's a large bag. I was surprised to see that many of the "stick" pieces are more like ends and odd bits as opposed to actual pieces of sticks but it doesn't really matter to me or my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Chew
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these chews! The scent can be a little I overwhelming but considering what it is, it should be expected. There is no digestive problems like with rawhide chews! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

product_meta.title: Best Bully Sticks Bully Stick Bites (2lb. Bag) - All-Natural Dog Treats
feature_bullets: 100% All-Natural Beef: Our bully stick bites are made from high-quality, free-range, grass-fed beef
Promotes Dental Health: Our bully stick bites for small dogs scrape away tartar and plaque through chewing action
High in Protein: Each bully stick bite is packed with protein to support a healthy diet for all dog breeds
Fully Digestible: Made of natural beef, these 100% digestible dog chews never splinter and are totally safe for your pet
Excellent Alternative to Rawhide: Our bully stick bites are free of any additives, hormones or unhealthy chemicals
